tags.tag_description:
Indefinitpronomen {beide, alle}
Bsp.: Mit dem Kieferorthopäden hatte er schon einmal gute Erfahrung gemacht. Der Zahn-techniker schien freundlich, sympathisch und kompetent. [Beide]IndefPron überzeugten ihn also.

Relativpronomen
Der Handwerker, [den] ich letztes Jahr kennengelernt habe
definite Nominalphrase {die Handwerkerin, beide Männer, die beiden Männer}
Resumptives Demonstrativpronomen (Der Nemec, der ist streng)
Resumptives Personalpronomen (Den Nemec, ihn kann ich nicht leiden)
Das Zero Pronomen wird am Prädikat, bzw. am flektierten Element des Prädikats markiert.
Other: Every name that is not a location, person or organisation

tag_sets.name: Operation
tag_sets.description: operation to be done with specified in tokenIDs token/tokens in order to correct

tag_sets.name: UD Universal Dependencies (v2)
tag_sets.description:
The idea of universal dependencies is to propose a set of universal grammatical relations which can be used with relative fidelity to capture any dependency relation between words in any language. Each dependency relation should be typed with one of the relations in the table below.

The following table lists the 37 universal syntactic relations used in UD v2. It is a revised version of the relations originally described in Universal Stanford Dependencies: A cross-linguistic typology (de Marneffe et al. 2014).

© 2014-2017 Universal Dependencies contributors.

See also: https://universaldependencies.org/u/dep/index.html

tag_sets.name: UD Universal POS tags (v2)
tag_sets.description:
These tags mark the core part-of-speech categories from the Universal Dependencies project. To distinguish additional lexical and grammatical properties of words, use the universal features.

© 2017 Universal Dependencies contributors

See: https://universaldependencies.org/u/pos/index.html

tags.tag_description: Alle anderen Formen tragen die grammatische Rolle Oblique

features.name: value
features.description: Correct this token using the specified operation.

features.name: operation
features.description: An operation taken to change this token.

features.name: category
features.description: Category of the semantic predicate, e.g. the frame identifier.
